long_description: The Freestyle Mariner watch is a sailing essential, whether you're in high surf or calm waters. From its race timer to its durable and truly waterproof design, this watch is a sailor's friend. Race timer features a beep alert that signals when the countdown is approaching zero. Timer also features automatic start after countdown, countdown repeat and count-up. Watch features dual time, alarm, backlight and comfortable silicone strap. The Freestyle Mariner watch features patented Hydro Pushers(TM) buttons that can be pushed while submerged for true waterproof protection to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Freestyle Mariner watch is a sailing essential, whether you're in high surf or calm waters. From its race timer to its durable and truly waterproof design, this watch is a sailor's friend.
